thread.title: George Michael's boyfriend says he slept in car on night of star's death and says Twitter account was hacked
thread.title_full: George Michael's boyfriend says he slept in car on night of star's death and says Twitter account was hacked

author: Telegraph Reporters
title: George Michael's boyfriend says he slept in car on night of star's death and says Twitter account was hacked
text:
George Michael's boyfriend says he slept in car on night of star's death and says Twitter account was hacked George Michael was found dead by his boyfriend Credit: PA Telegraph Reporters 2 January 2017 â€¢ 2:58am 
G eorge Michael's boyfriend has revealed he did not see the singer on the night of his death and fell asleep in his car instead. 
The 53-year-old star was found dead at his home in Goring-on-Thames, Oxfordshire, on Christmas Day. 
Michael's publicist has said there were no suspicious circumstances around his death, while police said more tests needed to be carried out after a post-mortem examination proved "inconclusive" . 
After news of the Faith singer's death broke, Fadi Fawaz, the singer's partner, said he found the star dead when he arrived to wake him ahead of a planned Christmas Day lunch. Watch | 'Very quiet' George Michael looked unwell weeks before death 01:19 
"I never saw him. I fell asleep in my car and I never saw him that night," Mr Fawaz told the Mirror . "The police know everything - that's the most important thing." 
M r Fawaz also denied sending tweets speculating about the cause of the pop superstar's death and said his Twitter account was hacked. 
A recent series of messages appearing on Mr Fawaz's now-closed account made reference to the musician having a history of self-harm. George Michael: his life and career in pictures 
B ut Mr Fawaz told the newspaper he did not send the tweets, which were later deleted, and described it as frightening to see them on his account. 
"My Twitter account has been hacked and closed," he said. "It's a bit scary to be honest. I did not send those tweets. I woke up at 11.30am to the news. 
"I am not going to worry about these things." 
Mr Fawaz began seeing Michael following the star's split from his former long-term partner Kenny Goss. In quotes | George Michael 
M ichael officially announced in 2011 that his 15-year relationship with Goss had ended - but said the pair had actually split around two years earlier. 
Their relationship was first revealed when Michael came out as gay after being arrested in public toilets in Beverly Hills, California, in 1998 for engaging in a lewd act. 
In a statement Goss said: "I'm heartbroken with the news that my dear friend and long-time love George Michael has passed." Follow Telegraph News
